mapper.select: select cp.cpId,cp.cpurl,cp.cpposition,t.commodityid,t.commodityname,t.commodityprice,t.commodityisman,t.commodityisshelves,cl.commoditysize,cl.cartListnumber,cl.cartListId from t_commodity t, t_commoditypicture cp ,t_cartList cl where cp.cpposition ='正面照' and cp.commodityid = t.commodityid and cl.commodityid = cp.commodityid and cp.commodityid = #{commodityId}
select count(*) from t_commodity where commodityisman = #{commodityisman}
select count(*) from t_commodity where commodityisman = #{commodityisman} and commodityPrice > #{low} and commodityPrice <= #{high}
